section.name: Get Involved
section.p: To contact the EJBCA team or to contribute, use the mailing lists, irc or contact the project administrator, who can be found on the sourceforge project page.

section.name: Contributors
section.p: We encourage and appreciate all contributions. Here is the list of all people who have donated their valuable time to produce code included in EJBCA. Many others have contributed with bug reports, feature suggestions etc etc.

ul.li: Tomas Gustavsson, tomas(at)primekey.se, Project founder.
Philip Vendil, philip(at)primekey.se, Core developer, project admin.
Anna Diruba Christensen, dilnet(at)hotmail.com, First project homepage design.
Nathan Phelps, nphelps(at)solarc.com, Testing, bugfinding and suggestions.
Leo Tai, hkleo(at)users.sourceforge.net, Oracle database configuration.
Timothy Fisher, timothyf(at)users.sourceforge.net], Architecture overview.
Karl-König Königsson, karlkoenig(at)users.sourceforge.net, Better deployment scripts for EJBCA 2.x.
Thomas Karlsson, thomas.karlsson(at)planet.eu.org, Firewall script, swedish translation.
Magnus Broqvist, magnus(at)han.pp.se, Initial P12toPEM implementation.
Slava Sklarewski, Slava.Sklarewski(at)de.gi-de.com, Data flow diagram.
Leonardo Souza Mario Bueno, isbueno(at)users.sourceforge.net, Patch for request template path.

Jean Ye, zhjeanye(at)pub.zhuhai.gd.cn, Support for Sybase, intial support for Active Directory, EJBCA 3.1 on Weblogic 8.1, port of EJBCA 2 to Java 1.2/EJB 1.0, suggestions and bugfixes. Quick guide for setting up a CA. Improved internationalization support. Chinese translation.
Lars Silven, lars(at)primekey.se, Core developer.
Gösta Bäckström, gosta.backstrom(at)goyada.com, Initial PKCS7 to browsers.
Ville Skyttä, ville.skytta(at)secgo.com, AdminCertReqServlet, Various patches, LDAP publisher advice
Koen Serry, koen(at)serry.org, Many small improvements.
Dickon Field, Dickon.Field(at)concise.co.uk, EJBCA 3.0.x on Weblogic 7.1.
Justin Wood, justin(at)braidquest.com, PKI Tools subproject.
Thomas Meckel, meckel(at)ophios.com, Initial OCSP implementation.
Jon Barber, jon.barber(at)acm.org, Early SCEP testing and fixes.
surd0007(at)yahoo.com.cn, Initial install guide.
Mike Jackson, mj(at)sci.fi, Proper LDAP schema. Device certificate schemas.
Stephane Bailliez, stephane(at)bearaway.org, Patches all over, XDoclet, new install, configure and cli for 3.1, web.
Yannick Quenec'hdu, yquenechdu(at)linagora.com, French translation, help with SafeNet HSM and some other patches, new EJBCA pki logo.
James A. Rome, jar(at)ornl.gov, Additional 'Use fields in DN' for publisher, JKStoPEM, lots of testing and input, change_p12_pwd.
Manuel Ruiz, mruiz(at)safa.es, Make admin commands flexible and usable from within java-code.

Risto Laanoja, risto.laanoja(at)eyp.ee, Fix for integer overflow when setting CRLPeriod longer than 596 hours. Several instances of one altName and other patches. User authentication with JAAS/Kerberos.
Giampaolo Tomassoni. Giampaolo(at)Tomassoni.biz, PostgresSQL 8.0.
Philipp Faerber, philipp.faerber(at)adnovum.ch, EJBCA 3.0.x on Weblogic 8.1, adminweb sql fix. Initial support for Eracom HSM. German translation.
Hu Aranjuez, mynetbus(at)126.com, Column name fix for MS SQL2000.
Marco Ferrante, marco(at)csita.unige.it, Italian translation, openssl migration howto, importcert cli function.
Alejandro Falcone, afalcone(at)speedy.com.ar, Spanish translation.
Bruno Bonfils, asyd(at)asyd.net, added X-ORIGIN to device schema for latest Sun Directory Server. Tested Cisco IOS and made the IOS Howto. OpenSSH and X509 authentication. Hudson.
Resurrección Mazo González, rmazgon(at)canarias.org, LdapSearchPublisher.
Ronan le Meillat, ronan.le_meillat(at)lesmuids.com, Htmlized french translation.
Zhengrong (Jerry) Liu, zjl6(at)users.sourceforge.net, Limit length of primary key columns when using UTF-8 encoding in MySQL, fix for static fields in server.xml.
Thomas Karlsson, karlsson(at)relea.se, Swedish translation of admin-GUI.
Gabriel Belingueres, belingueres(at)belingueres@yahoo.com.ar, Support for Informix 9.2.
Yovko Ilchev Yovkov, yyovkov(at)yyovkov.net, Howtos for Fedora Core 4 and 5.

Javier Aparicio Conesa, aparicio_fracon(at)gva.es, User notice and CPS in certificate policy extension. Directoryname in alternative names. CRL Issue period. Option to not remove certificates from publisher when revoked. Patch for unsuspend from CRL.
Jon Bendtsen, jon.bendtsen(at)laerdal.dk, OpenVPN installer package enrollment.
Henrik Schack, henrik(at)schack.dk, Documentation about dns alt name for Cisco PIX.
Alexander Horvath, alex(at)gekom.biz, Patch to make OCSP compatible with Thunderbird/Firefox.
Henrik Anreasson, han(at)han.pp.se, Debian package, installer and documentation improvements, lots of testing and suggestions.
Michael Rieken, michael.rieken(at)atosorigin.com, Updates to german translation.
Johan Eklund, johan(at)primekey.se, Core developer.
Rolf Staflin, rolf(at)piro.se, new public web.
Joakim Bågnert, joakim(at)primekey.se, Core Technician/Developer.
Munteanu Olimpiu Andrei, moa3333(at)gmail.com, Jasper reports functionality.
Lee, coregps(at)yahoo.com.cn, updates to chineese translation.
Yuji, yistoneriver(at)users.sourceforge.net, patch for deadlock problem.
Nuno Ponte, nuno.ponte(at)multicert.com, portugese translation, delta CRL, noOcspCheck extension, freshestCRL, intermediade nodes in LDAP, caIssuers AIA extension, and much more.
Nicolas Coudene, nicolas.coudene(at)linagora.com, completing the DB2 support, updates to french translation.
Sébastien Levesque, slevesque(at)linagora.com, WS-API calls for listing CAs and profiles.
Abbas Razam, abbasrazam(at)yahoo.com, fixes to ms-sql upgrade scripts 31_32 and 33_34.
Darren Johnson, darren.johnson(at)safenet-inc.com, split CAToken to be able to use separate JCE/JCA providers, makes SCEP work on Luna HSM with java provider.
Matt Stevenson, mavricknzwork(at)yahoo.com, code for adding CRMF and SPKAC requests in WS-API.Sybase and case-sensitive columns.
David Carella, dcarella(at)linagora.com, language improvements and other standard compliance suggestions.
